fields.description:
Added one python script in the query and the python script cannot be found during execution in yarn-cluster mode.
{noformat}

fixVersions.description: Dev branch for Hive on Spark

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.summary: Custom script in query cannot be executed in yarn-cluster mode [Spark Branch].
